properties.name: app
properties.description: name of the navigation app to use for directions. Specify using launchnavigator.APP constants. If not specified, defaults to User Selection.

properties.name: destinationName
properties.description: nickname to display in app for destination. e.g. "Bob's House".

properties.name: startName
properties.description: nickname to display in app for start . e.g. "My House".

properties.name: transportMode
properties.description: Transportation mode for navigation: "driving", "walking" or "transit". Defaults to "driving" if not specified.

properties.name: enableDebug
properties.description: If true, debug log output will be generated by the plugin. Defaults to false.

properties.name: extras
properties.description: a key/value map of extra app-specific parameters. For example, to tell Google Maps on Android to display Satellite view in "maps" launch mode: `{"t": "k"}`

properties.name: launchMode
properties.description: (Android only) mode in which to open Google Maps app: "maps" or "turn-by-turn". Defaults to "maps" if not specified. Specify using launchnavigator.LAUNCH_MODE constants.

properties.name: appSelectionDialogHeader
properties.description: text to display in the native picker which enables user to select which navigation app to launch. Defaults to "Select app for navigation" if not specified.

properties.name: appSelectionCancelButton
properties.description: text to display for the cancel button in the native picker which enables user to select which navigation app to launch. Defaults to "Cancel" if not specified.
